plot: This British production featured less known actors in filmed plays showing people caught in "the vise" of fate created by their own deeds.
plot_en: This British production featured less known actors in filmed plays showing people caught in "the vise" of fate created by their own deeds.
plot_es: This British production featured less known actors in filmed plays showing people caught in "the vise" of fate created by their own deeds.
title: The Vise
